channel.title: Basket of Eggs Animate [639][Dementhium]
channel.description:
Hello, i was wondering how in Dementhium 637/639 i can create the start of an animation for a specific item in this case Basket of eggs (4565) and the animation would be skipping (1836) and how it would do it continuesly until they unequip it, even while standing/moving. If somebody can teach more or give me this that would be WONDEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEERFULL.
Happy Easter sirs.
Salutations.
